name: Underwater Explorer: An Undersea Scuba Diving Adventure!
name_original: Underwater Explorer: An Undersea Scuba Diving Adventure!
description:
The all-new, all-fun Underwater Explorer Game is now available!

Join Diver Dan under the sea as he explores a magical world under the sea.

Dan has collecting his diving gear and now he is ready for adventure!

Help him collect the coins and sunken treasure. Bounce, tap and jump your way through this beautiful, unexplored underwater kingdom!

*Great Features Include*
- Addictive Game Play
- Awesome Graphics
- Unlock Football Powers
- Achievement Board
- Loads of Levels
- Endless Run Mode, Just Keep Going!
